feature: WIDE COMPATIBILITY: 2-in-1 Adjustable arm stand fit most tablets and phones from 4" to 10.1" ; Ideal for iPhones, iPad, iPad Mini, iPad Air, Samsung Tab series and more. Place in office, bedroom, kitchen, or bathroom to help you multi-task.
FULLY ADJUSTABLE: This tablet and phone holder stand is designed to swivel, tilt, and rotate up to 360 degrees and can extend to 16.93" for the best ergonomic viewing position while watching videos.
STABLE ADN STURDY: This heavy duty stand holder can hold up to 2.20lbs and easily adjust to your ideal angle
